Html: I need the ability to choose not days but months. So I set DisplayMode to CalendarMode.Year but when I choose the month, days are displayed automatically. Can I lock DisplayMode at Year state?

This is currently an unsupported scenario. I've added this to our list of feature requests. Unfortunately, I don't think there is a simple workaround to achieve this, though, by subclassing the parts of the calendar, you may be able to achieve this behavior.

Ben
